meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Angela Ward Andy Hyland Ellen Wernecke Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7591.

td.p: Angela Ward, a family assessment writer from Longview, Texas
Andy Hyland, a university communications director from Mission, Kansas
Ellen Wernecke, a social media analyst from Chicago, Illinois (whose 2-day cash winnings total $24,910)

tr.td: DELI-CACIES
AUTOBIOGRAPHIES
NFL RHYMES
ISLANDS
STAMPING PHILATELY
MOVIE HAPPY ENDINGS
